Mod4_Description: When cast above {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} Mana, {c_important}Blizzard's{/c} duration is increased by {c_number}{SF_14}{/c} seconds.
Mod2_Description: While you have an active {c_important}Blizzard{/c}, your {c_important}Core{/c} Skills cost {c_number}[{SF_16} * 100|%|]{/c} less Mana.
name: Blizzard
